-| wceq(c4, cfv(csca, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ≠ 0)→(1[÷]c3)∈ c2)
⊣ c4 =(Scalar ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c4)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c3), c2))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c3), c2)), wcel(co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c3)), c2))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(csca, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))

stmt.origin: subrgmcl(c2, ccnfld, c1, co(nat1, cdiv, c3), cmul)

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c3), c2)), wcel(co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c3)), c2))
-| wceq(cmul, cfv(cmulr, ccnfld))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c3), c2))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(csca, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))
-| wceq(cmul, cfv(cmulr, ccnfld))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ≠ 0))→(c1[÷]c3)∈ c2)
⊣ c4 =(Scalar ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c4)
⊣ × =(× ` CCfld)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c3), c2))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(csca, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ≠ 0))→(c1[÷]c3)∈ c2)
⊣ c4 =(Scalar ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c4)

comment: The scalar field of a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is closed under reciprocal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2015.)
